sub_title: Bol.com Projectmanager with consulting experience as Lean Black Belt
summary:
As a consultant Dimitri learned to become process minded and think in an analytical way. This helps him to compare processes, put this in perspective and (re)shape them. 
He reached his Lean Six Sigma Black Belt status by lowering defects and leading the project to a large savings. Clients that he has worked with are (Driscoll´s, Julius Clinical, municipality of Amsterdam, Conclusion Holding, NS, ASML, Philips and Tata Steel). They see Dimitri as a responsible and disciplined person that is easy to talk to. 

Helping organisations optimising their business processes is where his passion is.

projects.title: Driscoll´s - Consultant
projects.description: Together with a PA team of three, they were able to successfully reach process control. His role was that of the process expert. The first objective was to created process awareness (process defining and workshops). The next phase was to create process ownership (top down and bottom up). The last phase was to create process control (locking in change and automating processes). They were able to reach this within all departments at Driscoll´s.

projects.title: Municipality of Amsterdam, Process Manager
projects.description:
Mapping the high level processes for the HR department (part of the Personnel Services) for the Gemeente Amsterdam serving 14.000 employees. The main focus was having these processes described and optimized realizing the set goals for the Administrative Organization and Internal Control (AO/IC). 
Personal achievements: setting the process standard, mapping and optimizing the process and giving workshops and trainings within the department

projects.title: Bruna Smart Retail, optimizing and innovating processes
projects.description:
The Smart Retail Centre of Conclusion optimizes de performance of the retailer in two different ways:
-	Improving the customer intimacy and Omni-channel approach;
-	Operational excellence, optimizing and innovating processes. 
By doing this Conclusion has set up the first fully managed service center in the Netherlands.

The project at the Bruna was to map and optimize the processes for the finance department at its headquarters. The scope included:
1). mapping the processes by: leading workshops, interviews and drawing flowcharts and 
2). digitalizing / optimizing the workflow.

projects.title: Julius Clinical, International Contract Manager
projects.description:
The purpose of the function is to ensure an effective performance and planning of initiating, negotiating and closing contracts with Clinical sites. In accordance with the protocol, SOPs, applicable laws and ICH/GCP guidelines and in line with Sponsors guidelines and SOPs.

Responsibilities:
•	Responsible for budget and contract initiation direct after approval for PSV
•	Act as the primary contact with sites for negotiation of budget and contract.
•	Work closely with legal, PMs and Contracts PM.
•	Work according to Check Point Planning, reports to planner with respect to planning progress
•	Draft, negotiate and execute project-specific agreements and amendments on time and with desired quality.

projects.title: ASML: Talent projects
projects.description:
Talent projects: Business Process Documentation Complex field upgrades

One of the INPER-value propositions "Talent Projects"​ has turned into a fixed price, fixed date assignment for ASML Customer Service.

Project environment:
For a fairly new ASML-organization "Complex Field Upgrades"​ INPER has worked with ASML management and field service.

Project participants:
Two recently educated Nyenrode students (Erik Sanders and Dimitri Wulfers) took and did this challenging assignment. INPER and its business partner "Entrador" supported both Erik and Dimitri and ASML in this project.

Project challenge:
The key challenge was to identify best practices and best services processes to support the global ASML-upgrade teams in their day-to-day upgrade work at the customers premises.

Project result:
Starting practically from scratch we have delivered 8 key processes according to the customers standard (e.g.; ARIS-tool set).
As a result, the upgrade teams are able to improve their efficiency, process came available at a global level and......

...... we were proud of our results!

More information:

Frans Schreurs (INPER)
+31 6 11008226

profile_positions.description:
The main focus of the roll is coordinating all initiatives on the productivity program within logistics.This includes the following activities: 
•	Boosting productivity by making sure insights land in the workplace as well as at the management team.
•	Setting up and improving the control cycles for the warehouses.
•	Spotting improvement opportunities, challenging the business and coaching colleagues.
•	Ensure that everyone has the correct data and uses the same definitions.

profile_positions.description:
PA Consulting Group is a management consulting firm with globally 2.500 employees and in-depth market and domain knowledge. We focus on each client with an individual and pragmatic approach while delivering a lasting result.

My main focus points are: 'Business design and process mapping / improving.
profile_positions.title: Consultant Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Conclusion Implementation is a consulting firm focusing on implementing successful lasting organizational changes. Conclusion implementation has business experts in the area's of project management, change management en process optimization.

They assure that the clients strategy will be achieved by listing and acting on your company needs by doing it different. 

Personal key focus points where: 'process mapping and process improvement'.

Clients and roles:
- Amsterdam municipality, process manager
- Bruna, Consultant 
- Conclusion Holding, Bid manager 
- Julius Clinical, contract manager 
- Dutch Railroads, project manager
profile_positions.title: Projectmanager / Consultant

profile_positions.description: Consulting the ASML Customer Support Upgrades department. Working on a consultancy project to analyze and map processes in a structured way. This happens by interviewing employees and hosting workshops within the department to define the current way of working and spot where optimization is possible. The main tools I am working with to map the processes are: VISIO and ARIS.
profile_positions.title: Consultant at ASML

profile_positions.description: Working on a strategic project within Philips in order to gain more insights in the innovation of services. The project has its focus on improving all divisions in general at Philips. A qualitative report was the outcome of my thesis period. Working together with different layers in the organization and working with multiple divisions gave insight in the problems and the possible solution.
profile_positions.title: Master Thesis Project Service innovations

profile_positions.description:
Being the board of the Nieuwe Compagnie van Verre  (N.C.V.) (het Collegie der Heeren Vijf) is entrusted with the overall responsibility for all the activities of the N.C.V.

The board is managing all the committees of the association which are responsible for the extracurricular activities on campuswith an overall cash flow of approximately one million euros a year. 
Of all the people living on campus 95% of the people are active members in this association.

In summary, the Secretary is responsible for:
1.	Ensuring meetings are effectively organised and minuted
2.	Maintaining effective records and administration
3.	Upholding the legal requirements of governing documents, charity law, company law etc (where relevant).
4.	Communication and correspondence (internally and externally).
5.	Managing the ‘stuntweek’ (which is a week for participants to be choosen for the new board).
6.	Ad hoc tasks.
profile_positions.title: Secretary - Board Member

profile_positions.description:
The Master of Science in Management program is a 16 month during program with three specializations. The specialization I choose for my master period is international management. The program encompasses two phases: the pre-master and the master. 

Brief overview of courses during the International Management master period:

International Strategic Alignment
Global Sourcing
Brand Management
International Business & Diplomacy
Start-Up Business Planning
Venture Financing

profile_positions.description:
During his internship at Tata Steel he was located at the marketing communication department while working for the sector automotive.

The main focus of his internship was writing a large benchmarking report. This was done in order to see what other companies (relevant business to business companies and direct competitors) where doing on a marcom level.  
Besides this research, he worked on the day to day business activities.
